mapper.select:
SELECT st_statistic_legend.* FROM st_statistic_legend WHERE 1=1
AND st_statistic_legend.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{statisticLegend.id},'%')
AND st_statistic_legend.field LIKE CONCAT('%',#{statisticLegend.field},'%')
AND st_statistic_legend.legend LIKE CONCAT('%',#{statisticLegend.legend},'%')
AND st_statistic_legend.legend_key LIKE CONCAT('%',#{statisticLegend.legendKey},'%')
AND st_statistic_legend.legend_value LIKE CONCAT('%',#{statisticLegend.legendValue},'%')
AND st_statistic_legend.index LIKE CONCAT('%',#{statisticLegend.index},'%')
AND st_statistic_legend.record_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{statisticLegend.recordTime},'%')
AND st_statistic_legend.month_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{statisticLegend.monthName},'%')
